## Program class

Dynamic interface for interacting with Solana programs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Program
```

## Example

```jsx
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/solana";

const sdk = ThirdwebSDK.fromNetwork("devnet");
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Get the interface for your program
const program = await sdk.getProgram("{{contract_address}}");
```

| Constructor                                                                              | Modifiers | Description                                                 |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(programAddress, idl, connection, wallet)](./sdk.program._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Program</code> class |

| [network](./sdk.program.network.md)         |           | Cluster   |             |

| Method                                                | Modifiers | Description                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------- |
